arcane.desc: you now have access to Arcane magic.
arcane.label: Arcane Spellcaster

archetype.desc: you must choose to specialise in one of the available archetypes for your class.
archetype.label: Choose Archetype

areacontrol.desc: you have the ability to masterfully control your area of effect spells. Any friendly targets within an area effect you cast no longer take the negative effects.
areacontrol.label: Area Control

assassinate.desc: you are at your deadliest when you get the drop on your enemies. You have advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn in the combat yet. In addition, any hit you score against a creature that is surprised is a critical hit.
assassinate.label: Assassinate

auraofcourage.desc: you naturally inspire your allies with courage. Any ally within 3m of you gains +1 to Attack rolls. Increases to +2 at level 5, +3 at level 10, +4 at level 15 and +5 at level 20.
auraofcourage.label: Aura of Courage

auraofprotection.desc: you presence makes allies within 3m of you feel protected. They gain +1 on any Saving Throws. Increases to +2 at level 7, +3 at level 12 and +4 at level 17.
auraofprotection.label: Aura of Protection

backstab.desc: you are able to exploit weak spots when performing an Attack Action with a Piercing weapon from behind a non-moving enemy. If your attack hits you do an additional 1d6 piercing damage. Damage increases to 2d6 at level 3, 3d6 at level 5, 4d6 at level 7, 5d6 at level 9, 6d6 at level 11, 7d6 at level 13, 8d6 at level 15, 9d6 at level 17, 10d6 at level 19.
backstab.label: Backstab

bookworm.desc: your reading and studies have made you a knowledgeable individual, gaining +2 to any Knowledge checks.
bookworm.label: Bookworm

cunningaction.desc: you may now spend a Bonus Action in order to Dash, Disengage or Hide.
cunningaction.label: Cunning Action

disguise.desc: you are able to alter your appearance and voice to that of any other humanoid of a similar size. Preparation takes around an hour.
disguise.label: Disguise

divineintervention.desc: when you are hit by an attack that would lower your health to 0, you may use your Reaction to call on your god to intervene, causing the damage to be blocked.
divineintervention.label: Divine Intervention

divineshield.desc: you can call on the gods to protect you, granting you Resistance to all damage types until the start of your next turn.
divineshield.label: Divine Shield

divinesmite.desc: when making an Attack on an enemy that hits, you may expend a spell slot to add holy light to your weapon, doing an additional 2d8 damage plus 1d8 per level of the spell slot expended.
divinesmite.label: Divine Smite

doubleattack.desc: when making an Attack Action, you may attack twice.
doubleattack.label: Double Attack

dualwielding.desc: you may now add your damage modifier to attack rolls made with your off hand.
dualwielding.label: Dual Wielding

elusive.desc: you can move around the battlefield with grace, gaining immunity to Attacks of Opportunity.
elusive.label: Elusive

evasion.desc: you can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a red dragon's fiery breath or a Blizzard spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.
evasion.label: Evasion

favouredterrain.desc: you may choose a favoured terrain (desert, forest, hills, mountains, plains or swamps). You gain +1 to Speed and advantage on any Stealth checks while in this terrain.
favouredterrain.label: Favoured Terrain

duelist.desc: while attacking a target who is not adjacent to any characters friendly to it, you can perform Backstab from any side of the enemy.
duelist.label: Duelist

escape.desc: when an enemy ends their movement on a space adjacent to you, you may spend your Reaction to move up to your speed, provoking an Attack of Opportunity if applicable.
escape.label: Escape

focus.desc: you focus your studies on a particular school of magic (Abjuration, Alteration, Conjuration, Divination, Evocation or Illusion). Spells of that school gain a +1 to all rolls.
focus.label: Focus

quickshot.desc: when an enemy creature comes within range, you may make an Attack of Opportunity as your Reaction.
quickshot.label: Quickshot

hardy.desc: your experience in the wilderness makes you hardy. Gain Advantage on any CON saving throws.
hardy.label: Hardy

headshot.desc: you may make an Attack on a target within range, if it hits, the attack counts as a Critical Hit regardless of the roll.
headshot.label: Headshot

improvedcritical.desc: you now have a keener sense of your opponents weak spots. Attack rolls of 19 and 20 count as critical.
improvedcritical.label: Improved Critical

improveddivinesmite.desc: your Divine Smite can now be used as many times as you wish, provided you have spells slots to expend.
improveddivinesmite.label: Improved Divine Smite

layonhands.desc: you can use an Action to place a healing hand on a friendly character within range, healing them to full health. You must take a Long Rest before using this skill again.
layonhands.label: Lay On Hands

longshot.desc: your aim has become superhuman, and gain +5m Range on any ranged weapons.
longshot.label: Longshot

magichand.desc: you gain access to the Magic Hand cantrip and are able to use it to perform actions such as lockpicking and pickpocketing from a distance.

magicalprotection.desc: your arcane knowledge grants you increased protection from enemies spells. You now roll with advantage on any spell saves.
magicalprotection.label: Magical Protection

meditate.desc: as an Action you may immediately refresh a number of spell slots equal to your normal short rest allowance.
meditate.label: Meditate

mobile.desc: you can use a Bonus Action in order to Dash.
mobile.label: Mobile

nature.desc: you now have access to Nature magic.
nature.label: Natural Spellcaster

nimblemind.desc: you may choose to spend an available spell slot to cast a different spell of the same rank that is not currently prepared.
nimblemind.label: Nimble Mind

panache.desc: you have mastered the ability to charm and deceive, gaining Advantage on any Persuasion rolls against non-magical creatures.
panache.label: Panache

poisons1.desc: you now have access to rank 1 poisons.
poisons1.label: Poisons 1

poisons2.desc: you now have access to rank 2 poisons.
poisons2.label: Poisons 2

poisons3.desc: you now have access to rank 3 poisons.
poisons3.label: Poisons 3

poisons4.desc: you now have access to rank 4 poisons.
poisons4.label: Poisons 4

poisons5.desc: you now have access to rank 5 poisons.
poisons5.label: Poisons 5

potentpoisons.desc: creatures now suffer Disadvantage when attempting to save against your poisons.
potentpoisons.label: Potent Poisons

relentless.desc: when a creature gives you an attack of opportunity, you gain your Backstab bonuses on that attack.
relentless.label: Relentless

reliabletalent.desc: you have refined your skills until they approach perfection. Whenever you make a Thievery, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.
reliabletalent.label: Reliable Talent

resilience.desc: you have gained a natural toughness, granting you +1 Magic Reduction.
resilience.label: Resilience

shadowwalk.desc: during your Movement you are able to teleport between any shadows within your line of sight. The teleport counts as 2 points of movement. Attacks of opportunity rules still apply.
shadowwalk.label: Shadow Walk

shadowstrike.desc: if after moving via Shadow Walk you are now behind an enemy, you may make spend your Bonus Action to perform an immediate Backstab.
shadowstrike.label: Shadow Strike

spellmastery.desc: you may choose a spell on rank 3 or below. That spell is now considered a Cantrip and can be cast without being prepared.
spellmastery.label: Spell Mastery

spellsurge.desc: when casting a spell that does damage, you may choose to exhaust an additional slot of the same rank in order to in order to force a critical hit (maximum damage).
spellsurge.label: Spell Surge

strokeofluck.desc: you have an uncanny knack for succeeding when you need to. If your Attack misses a target within range, you can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if you fail an ability check, you can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
strokeofluck.label: Stroke of Luck

superiorcritical.desc: you have mastered the ability to exploit your opponents weak spots. Attack rolls of 18, 19 and 20 count as critical.
superiorcritical.label: Superior Critical

supernaturalawareness.desc: your heightened senses make you ready for combat. You now attack first in combat unless you are surprised.
supernaturalawareness.label: Supernatural Awareness

thievery.desc: your misspent youth has honed your thievery skills, gaining +2 to any Thievery checks.
thievery.label: Criminal

tracker.desc: your experience hunting has given you heightened senses, gaining +1 to Perception checks.
tracker.label: Tracker

tripleattack.desc: when making an Attack Action, you may attack three times.
tripleattack.label: Triple Attack

ironwill.desc: you now roll with advantage against being Feared.
ironwill.label: Unbreakable Will

unarmedstrike.desc: while wielding only your fists or blunt simple weapons, your attacks do 1d4+STR damage. As a Bonus Action you can also perform an additional unarmed strike. Your damage increases to 1d6 at level 4, 1d8 at level 8, 1d10 at level 12 and 1d12 at level 16.
unarmedstrike.label: Unarmed Strike

unarmoureddefense.desc: while not wearing any armour, you add your SPI stat to your Dodge rating.
unarmoureddefense.label: Unarmoured Defense

uncannydodge.desc: when an attacker that you can see hits you with an Attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you.
uncannydodge.label: Uncanny Dodge

vanish.desc: you can spend your Bonus Action to attempt to Hide with Advantage, on success you are considered invisible until your next turn.
vanish.label: Vanish

animalcompanion.label: Animal Companion
animalcompanion.desc: you may select an animal to become a permanent companion (hawk, panther, wolf, or bear). The animal has stats roughly equal to a character of your level -1, and dependant on the type selected.

sharedmind.label: Shared Mind
sharedmind.desc: you may transfer your consciousness into your animal companion, taking full control for up to 1 hour.

enrage.label: Enrage
enrage.desc: you may spend your Bonus Action for you and your animal companion to enter a rage. Gaining 1d8+SPI temporary health and all attacks that hit do an additional 1d8 damage.

sharedbody.label: Shared Body
sharedbody.desc: any beneficial effects that affect either you or your animal companion now affect both of you, including healing.

huntersmark.label: Hunter's Mark
huntersmark.desc: you may spend your Bonus Action marking a target you can see. You now deal an additional 1d6 damage when hitting that target and have Advantage on any Perception rolls when trying to find it.

volley.label: Volley
volley.desc: as an Action, you may make a ranged attack on a point within range. Roll an attack against all enemy creatures within 2m of that point.

whirlwind.label: Whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: as an Action, you may make a melee attack against any creatures within range. Roll an attack for each.

defensive.label: Defensive Stance
defensive.desc: as your Bonus Action, you may enter a defensive stance. All attacks made against you have Disadvantage, however you also have Disadvantage on your attacks if there is more than 1 enemy within melee range.

advance.label: Advance
advance.desc: you may now use the Dash action as your Bonus Action, however this movement must move towards an enemy creature.

eagleeye.label: Eagle Eye
eagleeye.desc: you gain +2 to attack and +2 to perception

imbueelement.label: Imbue Element
imbueelement.desc: when casting a spell that does Arcane damage, you may imbue it with either fire or cold, doing an additional 1d8 damage of that type.

arcanetorrent.label: Arcane Torrent
arcanetorrent.desc: your Arcane Missiles spell now does 2d4 per missile and you have full control over which targets the missiles hit.

multicast.label: Multicast
multicast.desc: as your Action, you may cast a spell you have prepared twice. This only consumes one spell slot.

armoured.label: Armoured
armoured.desc: you are now proficient with light, medium and heavy armour, as well as small shields.

arcaneswordsman.label: Arcane Swordsman
arcaneswordsman.desc: while wielding a conjured weapon, you gain +3 to your Attack modifier and Double Attack.

arcaneshield.label: Arcane Shield
arcaneshield.desc: as a Bonus Action, you may spend a spell slot to imbue your shield. Your shield gains Armour and Magic Reduction equal to the rank of the spell slot used until your next turn

protect.label: Protect
protect.desc: when an ally within melee range is being attacked, you may spend your Reaction in order to impose Disadvantage on the attack.

elementalfamiliar.label: Elemental Familiar
elementalfamiliar.desc: you may choose a permanent drakeling familiar (wither fire or ice). That familiar shares all stats with you, including health, and does 1d4+INT damage of the chosen type.

prodigy.label: Prodigy
prodigy.desc: your familiar is now capable of casting Cantrips.

detonate.label: Detonate
detonate.desc: as an Action you may command your familiar to detonate. All creatures within 2m must make an AGI saving throw or take 2d8+INT damage of the familiars type. On save success the damage is halved. You then take 2d8 Mind damage and the familiar reappears beside you.

arcaneelemental.label: Arcane Elemental
arcaneelemental.desc: your conjure elemental spells now have a 3rd option: Arcane, which does an additional 1d8 damage.

truthbringer.label: Truthbringer
truthbringer.desc: you may attempt to compel another humanoid creature to speak the truth. The target must succeed at a SPI Saving Throw vs your Spell DC or be compelled to speak truthfully for 1 minute.

deceiver.label: Deceiver
deceiver.desc: you gain Advantage on any Persuasion checks in which you are lying.

bloodfury.label: Bloodfury
bloodfury.desc: when an enemy within 5m of you dies, you gain 1d6 temporary health.

vowofpeace.label: Vow of Peace
vowofpeace.desc: you may, as your Bonus Action, speak a word on an enemy within 2m. That creature now rolls with Disadvantage when making attacks against you for 1 minute.

vowofself.label: Vow of Self
vowofself.desc: you may, as your Bonus Action, speak a word on an enemy within 2m. That creature is forced to attack the nearest target that is not you on it's next turn.

vowofenmity.label: Vow of Enmity
vowofenmity.desc: you may, as your Bonus Action, speak a word on an enemy within 2m. All of your attacks on that creature now have Advantage for 1 minute.

improvedlayonhands.label: Improved Lay on Hands
improvedlayonhands.desc: your Lay on Hands now has a pool of health that can be used each day, equal to half your maximum health. Lay on Hands no longer requires a rest between uses and you can choose how much health to heal on each touch.

shadowcaller.label: Shadowcaller
shadowcaller.desc: your spells that do Light damage now do an additional 1d8 Dark damage.

executioner.label: Executioner
executioner.desc: your melee attacks now do an additional 1d8 damage when attacking Wounded targets.

strengthofmind.label: Strength of Mind
strengthofmind.desc: Grants you +2 to Intelligence and Charisma Saving Throws.

strengthofspirit.label: Strength of Spirit
strengthofspirit.desc: Grants you +2 to Spirit and Constitution Saving Throws.

strengthofbody.label: Strength of Body
strengthofbody.desc: Grants you +2 to Strength and Agility Saving Throws.

charmer.label: Charmer
charmer.desc: You have a natural aura of friendliness about you, granting you +2 to Persuasion Checks.

mind1.desc: you now have access to rank 1 mind magic.
mind1.label: Mind 1

mind2.desc: you now have access to rank 2 mind magic.
mind2.label: Mind 2

mind3.desc: you now have access to rank 3 mind magic.
mind3.label: Mind 3

mind4.desc: you now have access to rank 4 mind magic.
mind4.label: Mind 4

mind5.desc: you now have access to rank 5 mind magic.
mind5.label: Mind 5
